text: Hagi Jotamu'a kinima mani'nea knafina Amoni vahera ha' ome huzmanteno hara huzmagatere'ne. Hagi e'ina'ma higeno'a, Amoni vahe'mo'za 3'a kafufi Jotamuna takisima ami'nazana, kna'amo'a 4 tani (3,400 kilo) hu'nea silva zagogi, 480 tani hu'nea witigi, 480 tani (1,820 kilo lita) hu'nea baligi hu'za mago mago kafurera eri'za eme amitere hu'naze.
